channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MA

item.title: Report X-2024091635
item.description:
Report X-2024091635

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-17

  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0

  • Description: DAMAGED HAZMAT WAS FOUND IN THE UNLOAD. PACKAGE CONTAINED AND BROUGHT TO THE DMP USING THE DECISION TREE FOR FLAMMABLE LIQUIDS. DAMAGE PROCESSED USING THE DECISION TREE FOR FLAMMABLE LIQUIDS.

item.title: Report X-2024091548
item.description:
Report X-2024091548

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-26T09:22:28+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-14
  • City: BOSTON
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 9/13/2024 at approximately 1945, Dangerous Goods Administration received a call from Employee 423023 at the station location in Boston, reporting a dangerous goods spill. The shipment consisted of 2 metal cans packaged in a fiberboard box. The shipment appeared to have been damaged due to mishandling, resulting in spillage. The shipment was labeled as Ground Limited Quantity, and improperly prepared for air transport. The shipment will be sent for proper hazardous disposal.
